name: clarinetist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who plays the clarinet: She plays the saxophone and is also a fine clarinetist. The piece was performed by clarinetist Paul Garner. See
clarinet
More examplesFewer examplesHe is now principal clarinetist of the Philadelphia Orchestra.The Ambrose band included the American clarinetist Danny Polo. Like most young clarinetists in the late 1960s and '70s, he was trained classically.
